code: import{GET_CHATS,GET_CHATS_FAIL,GET_CHATS_SUCCESS,GET_GROUPS,GET_GROUPS_FAIL,GET_GROUPS_SUCCESS,GET_MESSAGES,GET_MESSAGES_FAIL,GET_MESSAGES_SUCCESS,POST_ADD_MESSAGE,POST_ADD_MESSAGE_FAIL,POST_ADD_MESSAGE_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";export var getChats=function getChats(){return{type:GET_CHATS};};export var getChatsSuccess=function getChatsSuccess(chats){return{type:GET_CHATS_SUCCESS,payload:chats};};export var getChatsFail=function getChatsFail(error){return{type:GET_CHATS_FAIL,payload:error};};export var getGroups=function getGroups(){return{type:GET_GROUPS};};export var getGroupsSuccess=function getGroupsSuccess(groups){return{type:GET_GROUPS_SUCCESS,payload:groups};};export var getGroupsFail=function getGroupsFail(error){return{type:GET_GROUPS_FAIL,payload:error};};export var getMessages=function getMessages(roomId){return{type:GET_MESSAGES,roomId:roomId};};export var getMessagesSuccess=function getMessagesSuccess(messages){return{type:GET_MESSAGES_SUCCESS,payload:messages};};export var getMessagesFail=function getMessagesFail(error){return{type:GET_MESSAGES_FAIL,payload:error};};export var addMessage=function addMessage(message){return{type:POST_ADD_MESSAGE,message:message};};export var addMessageSuccess=function addMessageSuccess(message){return{type:POST_ADD_MESSAGE_SUCCESS,payload:message};};export var addMessageFail=function addMessageFail(error){return{type:POST_ADD_MESSAGE_FAIL,payload:error};};
